description:
By geocoding you get the latitude and longitude of an address. The Google Maps API offers geopcoding (as well as reverse geocoding).

You need an Google API key, see https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/start

Add addresses as node, enter your API key in the parameters and fetch data.

Be aware of request limits (at the time of this writing 2500 requests per day and 50 requests per second): https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/usage-limits
name: Geocoding
